entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is mentioned as the one who has died. The text states "Dumbledore — he's dead!" and then repeats it with "Cedric Diggory! Dead!"

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who has died. The text states "Dumbledore — he's dead!"

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Minister Fudge is mentioned in the text, trying to pry Harry from Cedric's body

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Diggory are related through death. The text states that both of them have died.
